home.title: Aymane Maniani
home.subtitle: Full Stack Developer (ReactJS/Angular & Laravel)
home.description: Modern, fast and aesthetic web solutions. Between innovation, performance and careful user experience, every line of code aims for digital excellence.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Passionate about web development, I design dynamic applications by combining the power of Laravel on the backend with the reactivity of React on the frontend. I'm particularly interested in creating fluid, intuitive, and high-performance interfaces, while ensuring clear architecture and well-structured code.
about.description2: Always seeking progress, I enjoy taking on new challenges, exploring innovative technologies, and participating in meaningful projects.

items.title: E-learning Platform
items.description: Development of an interactive educational platform that allows users to learn online with progress tracking, user management, and dynamic content.

items.title: Accessories E-commerce Website
items.description: Creation of an online store with WordPress and WooCommerce, integrating product management, orders, payments, and a custom admin interface.

items.title: Interactive Educational Game
items.description: Development of a fun mini-game for children to test their knowledge through an animated interface, with scoring and visual progression.
